titles.title: AT HOME Act of 2013
Aviation Teams Helping Our Municipalities' Economies Act of 2013
To direct the Secretary of Defense to prohibit the performance of Department of Defense flight demonstration teams outside the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 4/25/2013--Introduced. Aviation Teams Helping Our Municipalities' Economies Act of 2013 or AT HOME Act of 2013 - Prohibits any funds available to the Secretary of Defense (DOD) for FY2014-FY2015 from being used for the performance of flight demonstration teams under DOD jurisdiction at any location outside the United States.
